casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Davis, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Davis (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 40.]

(No. 98-1343 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided December 2, 1998.) Ronald J. O’Brien, Franklin County Prosecuting Attorney, and Amy H. Kulesa, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Stephen M. Straus, for appellant.

*41The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

Motor, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
